Class SQLStringFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLStringFactory

  • public class SQLStringFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class used to generate String objects formatted for SQL queries.

        primaryKeyName - name of the primary key

        foreignKeyType - SQL type of the foreign
        foreignKeyReferencesTable - table associated with foreign key
        foreignKeyReferencesColumn - column in this table for foreign key
